name: Mole Galore
description:
IMPORTANT. Due to a problem with rendering that I missed, buttons for volume change, level restart and level select screen are invisible when playing a level on a larger board, but they are still there.

This is a submission for Brackeys Game Jam, with the theme of "Holes".

A puzzle game with visuals inspired by Whack-a-Mole.

features:
20 levels, split between 2 board sizes
10 types of moles with different behaviors
Music and Graphics inspired by retro arcade games

Controlled with the mouse.

The game was created in cooperation with vikervonzogo, who made the music and helped playtest the game.
